title: Digitalarkivet
description: Website for the Norwegian National Archives. I helped build the digital asset management system associated with the site, used to view and edit photos, documents and their metadata, from scratch.

title: Kabal
description: Card game, also known as Solitarie. A fun though challenging project, featuring an advanced state management system. It treats each card as its own state, allowing cards to be moved with minimun knowledge of the state of other cards.

title: Mock TV program guide
description: An mock Electronic Programe Guide (EPG) that allows you to find the 'current' shows. A project made as part of a job application process

title: Norwegian skiing
description: A video portfolio site, requested made for a video-project. Utilizes Contentful as (headless) CMS to allow content editing by website owner. The site displayed here displays mock data however.

title: CV Maker
description: This was a project we worked on for the first weeks at Skyetec. While meant as an internal application, this was also a traning project.

title: MyPrivateChef
description: MyPrivateChef features a fictional booking service for busy people wanting to hire a chef, such as for a party. The website was made as a final project at the Salt bootcamp.

title: Snake
description: A classic game, that's just as fun to play as to make. The game works both on mobile and desktop
